description: Irregular array: For any prime p that divides n, if the highest power of the prime p that divides n is p^b(n,p), then p^b(n,p) = Sum_{k=1..m} a(n,k), where m is the order of the prime-power p^b(n,p) among the prime-powers (each being the highest power of each prime q that divides n, where q divides n) when they are ordered by size. Row 1 = (1).
